title: Flame Lash
brief: Flame Lash: strike moment — Apply 1 Burn.
must_have: elemental VFX matching name (fire/ice/lightning/wind/lava); runic embers; A whip of wildfire snaps between ancient pines, scattering embers across mossy ground.
lighting: fiery orange key; cool blue rim

title: Spark Jab
brief: Spark Jab: strike moment — Deal 4 damage twice.
must_have: elemental VFX matching name (fire/ice/lightning/wind/lava); runic embers; A needle of light arcs from a mossy rune-stone, pricking bark with sparks.

title: Electro Surge

must_have: elemental VFX matching name (fire/ice/lightning/wind/lava); runic embers; Branches glow blue as a surge races along wet vines in a stormed grove.

title: Gale Slash

title: Thunder Clap

must_have: elemental VFX matching name (fire/ice/lightning/wind/lava); runic embers; Thunder splits a canopy, shockwave rippling puddles and shaking cones
